texts:
You start pulling random books off the shelf, glancing at the covers in search of something that might help your situation. 
Before long, you uncover a hidden alcove in the wall of the left bookshelf, secreting away a scroll bound with a purple ribbon.
Unwrapping it, you recognize an incantation for a powerful offense spell that channels frost at an enemy: gelez.

endSceneEvents.keyword: Memorizing the spell, you turn back to the desk.
